title: Bug 17618: Changing output location should delete all derived resources
description: When changing the output location of a project, all derived resources should be deleted. However, currently, after changing the output location and then changing it back to the original location, the class files are removed but the resources are still present in the project/bin folder. Note that when opening the properties dialog for such a resource, it is tagged as 'Derived'.
OB:
1) Create a project with autobuild on.
2) Import Java sources and resources.
3) Change the output folder to project/bin.
4) All class files are removed (as expected).
5) Change the output folder back to the project.
6) All class files are removed (as expected).
7) Open project/bin folder.
8) All resources are still present.

Note: When opening the properties dialog for a resource in the project/bin folder, it is tagged as 'Derived'.
EB: The resources in the project/bin folder should be deleted when the output location is changed back to the project.
SR: Ensure that changing the output location of a project deletes all derived resources, including the resources in the project/bin folder.
